po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang dmigs la/ stong

pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang sna dang /

lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/

phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes

bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yang yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa

zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa

nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna

ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa/

zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang

dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya

bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi

khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par

shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa na nga stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid

ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi

stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag

gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang

bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med

pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/

'di ni bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan

la bstan par mi bya'o/ /zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig

to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol du phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med par byed de rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam

gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo / /zhes bdud kyi las mi ston bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can

dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das

pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /yongs su ston to/ /zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston

pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/

'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi

smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu

mig gi bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par

shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam

bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis

stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag

gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi

cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /

byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub

sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig

par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo bcad

pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon

du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya

ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong

pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa

dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan

ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /

stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa

dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi

'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /

mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /

mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston

pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i 'dud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas

kyang yongs su spong bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub

kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems can la yang tshig med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do/ /rab

'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma la gnas med do/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chu zla dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul ba la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor

'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub

sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par

shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste

dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor

ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched

drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha

rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// //

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam

gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi

don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na yid

de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper

na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes

pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ ma rig pa la

gnas med do de ci'i phyir zhe na ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab

'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa

dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar

gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang

'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa

la gnas ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba

med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon

mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la/

gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar

gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so

so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang

'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin

du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du

rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin du

rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong

ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab

'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do/ /rab

'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi

don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes

gzigs pa la/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/

nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang /

glog gi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med

do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med

do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi

'od la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/

thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang

mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du bstan pa dang /

lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/

rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po

de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/

rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las

kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par

'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs

rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes

su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab

'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang /

log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /

dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de

dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba

bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/ de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag

ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par

spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa

yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa

med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pa gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar ba dang po'o/ /

nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par

gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/

rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam

pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar ba brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs

te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la

nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes

brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang

snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed

pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las

yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/

'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa

ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun

dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi

sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos

zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma

yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin

nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong

ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/ chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa

med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i

slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi

phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la

gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo

rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la

sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan

las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad

kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa

thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges

pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug

bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang du 'di ltar sems bskyed par

bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag

kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug

bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi

sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi

byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can

thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med

pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa

gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon

tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi

stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig

pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag

dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar

lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs

rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad

du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched dang /

khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /

dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par

dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du

dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs

su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags

pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de

ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/ nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams

cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/

gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa

med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med

cing / khongs su chud pa med de zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang mi zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan

thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo

rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi

thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed

dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar

yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes

dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma

zad de/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags

pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /

byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i

sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la/ bdag kyang spobs pa

skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems

can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol

du phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul

khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams

cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do/ /

sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di

snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su

rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab
