kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /

tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang

thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag

la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su

gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse

gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams

cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs par/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha

rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul

khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang

thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes

nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du

phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo

ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la

spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par

mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /

mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de

yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la

de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing brtun mi

ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du

phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad la

sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su

sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin

pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan

pa'i yid bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/ sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing

dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs

te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go

cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la gnas shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang

sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de

yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig

tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du

phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma

yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/

pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi

'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/

thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa

dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag

na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su

smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad de/ dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la

yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis

pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas/

'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/

mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam

par spyod do/ /de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad

med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /

snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings

kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang

bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye

mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen

po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing / 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de

dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam

gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag

gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis

rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi

ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag

dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon

pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad

yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes/ de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can

thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la

spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs

par nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam

gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge

ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar

byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa

dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang /

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa

chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med

pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa

'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par

mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang

bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med

pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par

gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos

kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan

rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa brgyad sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub

sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /

rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid ces

bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes

bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes

bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong

pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin

nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs

su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs

par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /

bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems

dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /

sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes

thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg

pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ /zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /

byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che

ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po gyon cing / 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin

pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/

'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /

mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/

sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs

dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu

skyod de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /

'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam

par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o/ /de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i

'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par

sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song

gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i

'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i

sems can rnams/ ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/ de bzhin pa'i

phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba/ mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi

sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha

'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la/ rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel

dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/

mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma

rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i

tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i

bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes

bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te/ skye bo yongs su bzung bas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems

can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig

pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang nam yang

'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems

can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i

las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos

rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas

rdeg cing / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o/ /zhes go cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/

sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar ba dang / rab tu dgod par byas na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam

du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar

bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas

shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus

dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/

skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la

bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang /

sems can gang yang lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab

'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan

gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du

phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam

gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul shing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig

gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te/ bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/

sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor

de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing /

ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol du

phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams

cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyis chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs

ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang

dag par skul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul

zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /

nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i

tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la

yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha

rol du phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de/ bdag

gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin

pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la da god par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni da god par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed

cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par

bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems

can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi

'byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par

bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir

mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan

bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol du phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la dgod par byas pa yod dam/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med

pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyang / sems can gang gi don du yang sems bskyed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir

te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par

shes pas stong ngo / /mig mig gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo / /gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par

shes pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo / /

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor bas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa

bdun/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo / /go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma

byas/ mngon par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de

dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi

byed do/ /rab 'byor mig mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /sgra dang /

dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par

shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te

reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/

mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor sems can ni mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gso ba dang / skyes bu dang /

gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/

mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs pa'i
